title: A January Dandelion - image of "sands" in line 2

content.question: The image of “sands” (line 2) most clearly serves to evoke the

choices.label: snow blown aloft by the wind
dandelion's seeds floating in the air
bed in which the dandelion grows

content.answer: snow blown aloft by the wind

skill.text: Skill 5.D: Identify and explain the function of an image or imagery.
